fields.name: Mountain Sketch
fields.description: Create a detailed sketch of a mountain range, focusing on depth and perspective to bring out the grandeur of the landscape.

fields.name: Meadow Painting
fields.description: Paint a serene meadow with wildflowers and a clear sky, emphasizing vibrant colors and natural beauty.

fields.name: Quick Portrait
fields.description: Draw a quick sketch of a face focusing on proportions and capturing emotion in under an hour.

fields.name: Detailed Portrait
fields.description: Create a detailed portrait capturing subtle expressions, shading, and fine details of facial features.

fields.name: Fruit Bowl Study
fields.description: Sketch a fruit bowl with detailed attention to shapes, shadows, and light reflections.

fields.name: Flower Vase Drawing
fields.description: Draw a vase of flowers, focusing on the petals' texture, the vaseâ€™s shape, and the interplay of light and shadow.

fields.name: Cat Silhouette
fields.description: Sketch the silhouette of a cat, focusing on capturing its curves and posture with simplicity.

fields.name: Bird in Flight
fields.description: Draw a bird in flight, emphasizing the wingspan and key features such as the beak and feathers.

fields.name: City Street Sketch
fields.description: Sketch a bustling city street scene with buildings, people, and vehicles, focusing on perspective.

fields.name: Night Scene Drawing
fields.description: Illustrate a night-time urban scene, capturing the glow of streetlights and reflections on the pavement.

fields.name: Wave Study
fields.description: Draw the movement of ocean waves, focusing on their fluidity and the play of light on water.

fields.name: Boat on the Horizon
fields.description: Illustrate a boat floating on the water with a horizon in the background, emphasizing depth and simplicity.
